title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: An antsy restlessness might creep up on you now if you spend too much time living in your head. Put down your phone, step away from the keyboard, or take a break from number crunching today. Appreciate a little of what nature has to offer or the stimulation of a face-to-face conversation. Do some healthy exercise or gentle stretching to reconnect with your body. Drink water and eat a nourishing meal. Grounding activities can provide a profoundly centering influence. Dancer Bella Lewitzky said, "To move freely you must be deeply rooted." Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
